resources.string:
• Purpose of this application is to check user's GPS-location periodically and SMS it to user's selected contact(s).
 Just so users do not have to bother during journey to inform about their present location.
 • Person/People receiving SMSs, will get a Google Maps internet-link, through which they can check senders location on Google Map.
 • How to use:
 1) Turn on GPS-location of your device.
 2) Select contact(s) to whom you want to inform your route's GPS-locations through SMSs.
 3) Select time-duration. After every interval updated location will be sent automatically.
 4) Press "Start Logger" button to Start.
 5) Press "Stop Logger" button to Stop.
 NOTE:
 • As this app sends location updates using SMS, so make sure you have enough credit or a SMS package activated.
